title: I am (was) a toxic player, I want to improve. @Lyte
body:
Hello,
On January 14 (I think) I received a 2-week ban for my toxicity, and decided that it was better to leave the game for awhile rather than continue to create a negative atmosphere for others. I'm receiving my new Laptop soon and I wanted to get back into League of Legends, one of my favorite games. I was wondering @Lyte if chat logs could be posted for me from the time of my ban, and if you could give some constructive feedback to help me improve my actions? I love League of Legends, and I truly do want to reform.

Thank you.
-A misguided summoner.


-Edit- I realized I may have posted this in the wrong spot. Reposting here.
